title: Apple iPhone 13
description: Apple iPhone 13 with A15 Bionic chip, 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, 128GB storage, and dual 12MP camera system.

title: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: Samsung Galaxy S21 with Exynos 2100 processor, 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X, 128GB storage, and triple 64MP camera.

title: OnePlus 9
description: OnePlus 9 powered by Snapdragon 888, 6.55-inch Fluid AMOLED display, 128GB storage, and 48MP Hasselblad camera.

title: Xiaomi Mi 11
description: Xiaomi Mi 11 featuring Snapdragon 888, 6.81-inch AMOLED display, 128GB storage, and 108MP primary camera.

title: Google Pixel 6
description: Google Pixel 6 with Google Tensor chip, 6.4-inch OLED display, 128GB storage, and 50MP dual rear camera system.

title: Huawei P50 Pro
description: Huawei P50 Pro with Kirin 9000, 6.6-inch OLED display, 256GB storage, and quad 50MP camera system.

title: Oppo Find X3 Pro
description: Oppo Find X3 Pro featuring Snapdragon 888, 6.7-inch AMOLED display, 256GB storage, and 50MP dual rear camera.

title: Vivo X70 Pro
description: Vivo X70 Pro powered by Exynos 1080, 6.56-inch AMOLED display, 256GB storage, and 50MP quad camera system.

title: Sony Xperia 1 III
description: Sony Xperia 1 III with Snapdragon 888, 6.5-inch OLED 4K display, 256GB storage, and triple 12MP camera with Zeiss optics.

title: Asus ROG Phone 5
description: Asus ROG Phone 5 featuring Snapdragon 888, 6.78-inch AMOLED display, 256GB storage, and 64MP triple rear camera.
